item.title: Regex / Regexp Reference
item.description: Regex Case insensitive (?i) Referensi: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22961535/what-does-i-and-in-this-regex-mean https://regex101.com/r/hE9gB4/1 https://regexr.com/3f4vo Regex to match string containing two names ###Explanation of command that i am going to write:- . means any character, digit can come in place of . means zero or more occurrences of thing written just previous to it. | means ‘or’. So, james.*jack would search james , then any number of character until jack comes. Since you want either jack.*james or james.
